summary: This is an email from an FBI agent to an NYPD contact regarding a planning and coordination meeting requested by the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to discuss the arrest plan for Jeffrey Epstein. It indicates inter-agency coordination prior to Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email and the individual whose arrest is being planned and coordinated between SDNY, FBI, and NYPD.

events.title: Coordination meeting for Epstein arrest
events.description: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) requests a meeting with the FBI and NYPD to discuss and coordinate the plan for arresting Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) was actively planning the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein as of June 28, 2019.
The email shows coordination between federal (SDNY, FBI) and local (NYPD) law enforcement agencies regarding the arrest operation.
The document is dated shortly before Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, indicating advanced planning stages.
